title: Business Analyst
description:
We are hiring for Telamon HR Solutions.

About The Company

Telamon HR Solutions is a leading staffing and recruiting company in India. We specialize in providing comprehensive HR solutions to our clients, helping them find the right talent for their business needs.

Job Title: Business Analyst to MD

Roles And Responsibilities


Support the Managing Director in strategic decision-making and provide visibility across businesses
Monitor and analyze relevant data points to track performance and report to the MD
Conduct research on individuals, companies, and industry analysis for external meetings
Evaluate new market opportunities, potential alliances, and other growth prospects
Liaise with CXOs and functional leaders to drive initiatives from the MD's office
Engage with external stakeholders, consultants, and government bodies/associations
Effectively manage programs and projects from the MD's office


Candidate Qualifications


B.Tech. / B.E. & MBA from a premier institute
2-4 years of experience in supporting/direct reporting roles to the leadership OR Management Consulting experience


Required Skills


Analytical mindset
Strategic thinking
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
